title: Hot Babes n Sexy Girls Pict 6
creator: Research Droid

extendedInfo.description: These pictures can be used as a simple Live Wallpaper for your smartphone.Every picture can be saved in SD card.Works with every screen resolution in automatic from 240x320 to Tablet resolutions!This app moves when you slide the screens and it is able to move to SD memory.

reviews.title: Three giod pics, but
reviews.comment: So two of the three good pics are shown in the app store (there are a dozen or so pics). Why not make this one app, instead of pict 1, 2, 3 etc each being there own app. Even better, this is not really an app, and the dinky red buttons get in the way of forced adds, so instead of clicking \"next pic\" you get a pop up, yuk.
reviews.author: Chadd Simpson
